IVV.AX.description: Tracks the S&P 500 Index, providing exposure to 500 of the largest US companies across diverse sectors.
IVV.AX.goodFor: Long-term growth investors seeking broad US market exposure with low fees. Ideal for building core portfolio holdings.

NDQ.AX.description: Provides exposure to the NASDAQ-100 Index, focusing on the 100 largest non-financial companies listed on NASDAQ.
NDQ.AX.goodFor: Investors seeking concentrated exposure to US technology and growth companies. Higher volatility but strong long-term growth potential.

EBTC.XA.description: Provides direct exposure to Bitcoin through a physically-backed ETF structure, tracking Bitcoin's price movements.
EBTC.XA.goodFor: Investors seeking cryptocurrency exposure through a regulated, exchange-traded structure. High volatility asset class.

EETH.XA.description: Provides direct exposure to Ethereum through a physically-backed ETF structure, tracking Ethereum's price movements.
EETH.XA.goodFor: Investors seeking Ethereum exposure through a regulated ETF structure. Suitable for those comfortable with high cryptocurrency volatility.

STRF.description: Strategy Inc. focuses on strategic investment opportunities across various asset classes and market segments.
STRF.goodFor: Investors seeking actively managed exposure with strategic allocation across multiple asset classes.

VHY.AX.description: Focuses on Australian companies with high dividend yields, providing income-focused exposure to the Australian equity market.
VHY.AX.indexTracked: FTSE Australia High Dividend Yield Index
VHY.AX.strategy: Passive index tracking - high yield focus
VHY.AX.goodFor: Income-focused investors seeking regular dividend payments from Australian companies. Suitable for retirees or those building passive income streams.

VAP.AX.description: Provides exposure to Australian real estate investment trusts (REITs) and property securities, tracking the S&P/ASX 300 A-REIT Index.
VAP.AX.goodFor: Investors seeking exposure to Australian commercial and residential property markets through REITs. Provides diversification and regular income distributions.

VAF.AX.description: Invests in a diversified portfolio of Australian fixed interest securities, including government and corporate bonds.
VAF.AX.goodFor: Conservative investors seeking stable income with lower volatility. Ideal for portfolio diversification and capital preservation. Suitable for those nearing or in retirement.
